description: This file defines APIs and function declarations for managing data related to Hotspot connected devices within a Data Model Library. It primarily contains function prototypes for setting and getting parameters associated with hotspot connected devices.

methods.name: HotspotConnectedDevice_SetParamStringValue
methods.description: Sets a string parameter value for a hotspot connected device instance.

methods.name: HotspotConnectedDevice_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value for a hotspot connected device instance.
